category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_Hours_Per_Day_Preference
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of work hours per day, as used for calculating calendar end dates. The value can vary depending on the site (e.g 8 hours for the US, 7.5 hours for the UK). The default value is 8.
